data.title: South Korean president declares emergency martial law, blames opposition
data.description: South Korean President Yoon Suk Yeol declared an “emergency martial law,” Tuesday accusing the country’s opposition of controlling the parliament, sympathizing with North Korea and paralyzing the government with anti-state activities.

data.title: South Korean president declares martial law
data.description: SEOUL - South Korea’s president has declared emergency martial law in the country, accusing opposition forces of anti-state activities.

data.title: European police crack criminals’ messaging service
data.description: AMSTERDAM - An encrypted messaging service that was used for international drug and arms trafficking has been taken down by European authorities, Europol said on Tuesday.

data.title: Elton John says he has lost his eyesight
data.description: LONDON - Music legend  Elton John  has told a theatre audience in London that he’s lost his sight after struggling to recover from an eye infection earlier in the year.

data.title: allnex's innovation journey in Southeast Asia - Miguel Mastas | EP.21
data.description: In this episode of Time to Talk, Mr. Miguel Matas takes us through GC plus allnex’s innovation journey in Southeast Asia.

data.title: Big haul of bullets seized from illegal migrants
data.description: KANCHANABURI: The arrest of nine  illegal migrants  from  Myanmar  has led to the discovery of almost 3,000  bullets  in a house in Muang district where they were staying, police said on Tuesday.

data.title: Transparency sought in Cambodia talks
data.description: The opposition People’s Party has called on the Thai government to ensure transparency in the appointment of a  joint technical committee  (JTC) to negotiate with  Cambodia  over  disputed maritime areas .

data.title: Thailand’s BOI to boost sustainable investment with new tax structure
data.description: Measures of the five-year strategy include tax thresholds and a ‘tax collection and refund’ mechanism with a focus on supporting sustainable business practices

data.title: Thailand considers tax reforms to boost investment, economic equity
data.description: Proposed reforms target corporate income tax, personal income tax, and VAT

data.title: Nation Group sets ambitious green targets for 2035
data.description: The group’s CEO, Shine Bunnag, announces plans to reduce, and offset carbon emissions through reforestation and the adoption of green business practices

data.title: Rainmaking flights give air quality instant boost
data.description: The  air quality index  (AQI) in Bangkok, its adjacent provinces and some northern provinces has reportedly i mproved  following the first day of  rainmaking flights  by the Department of Royal Rainmaking and Agricultural Aviation (DRRAA).

data.title: NBTC, police dismantle massive illegal cable network
data.description: Network was supplying call centre gangs across borders

data.title: Government ‘failing scam victims’
data.description: A Senate committee has blamed the government for failing to protect people from falling victim to investment  fraud  scams such as the one involving Dr   Boon Vanasin  , the founder of Thonburi Healthcare Group.

data.title: Fire guts 'ghost ship' on Koh Chang
data.description: A  fire  aboard an old, abandoned floating hotel known as the " ghost ship " sent black smoke billowing into the sky over the  resort island  of  Koh Chang , off the Trat coast, on Tuesday..

data.title: Koh Chang’s famous ‘abandoned ship hotel’ goes up in flames
data.description: The authorities are contacting the owner to estimate damages as firefighters reckon it will take three days for the flames to consume the property

data.title: Cabinet approves 'retirement lotto' bill
data.description: The cabinet has approved a draft law establishing a "retirement lotto" aimed at helping people save the money they spend on purchases of tickets, Deputy Finance Minister Paopoom Rojanasakul said on Tuesday.

data.title: Chiang Mai Night Safari pauses star tiger Eva’s display
data.description: Zoo’s star strawberry tiger will take a temporary break because she is at reproductive age and requires regular checkups

data.title: Conditional release of Boonsong ‘not paving way’ for Yingluck return
data.description: Minister of justice says that beyond Boonsong, other prisoners involved in rice-pledging scandal may get conditional release

data.title: Chinese 'cuck' arrested over rape-sex video with student
data.description: Police have arrested a 33-year-old Chinese man with a  sexual fetish  for the  alleged rape , which he also  videoed , of an 18-year-old university  student  in Bangkok.
